lore.glistering_soup: Grants regeneration and heals when consumed
lore.sea_berries: Grants water breathing, dolphin's grace and night vision when consumed
lore.faerie_maltose: Grants levitation and slow falling at the expense of hunger when consumed
lore.blazing_skewer: Grants fire resistance and absorption when consumed
lore.runny_egg_sandwich: Protein rich and filling but high in cholesterol
